description: Hemoglobin carries oxygen in the blood.
low_msg: Low hemoglobin may indicate anemia or blood loss.
high_msg: High hemoglobin may indicate dehydration or lung disease.

description: Blood glucose level indicates sugar in blood.

low_msg: Low cholesterol is usually not harmful.
high_msg: High cholesterol increases heart disease risk.
High platelets may increase clot risk.

low_msg: Low creatinine is usually not concerning.
high_msg: High creatinine may indicate kidney problems.
